mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson
mdRecord.dcterms:description: His Excellency Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 14 1862. By Telegraph from Charleston 14 1862. I am much pleased with the arrangement Lieut col Richmond has made in reference to West Cavalry = Should be pleased to have the company official at once as I wish to use it this man Steel recommended as Capt has been Spoken of before Col Lightburn Comdg 4th Brigade 44D137pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson
Charleston, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
